message:
This last week has been a tragic time for Sierra Leone. Immense mudslides and floods have already killed more than 450 Sierra Leonean citizens, and more than 150 of them were children. More than 600 others have already gone missing, and more than 20 000 have already been displaced by the mudslides, including 5000 children. 

The MIT African students Association stands with Sierra Leone in these tragic events. Our prayers and thoughts are with everyone who was affected.  

Checkout our blog to learn more about what you can do to help. 
http://africans.mit.edu/we-stand-with-sierra-leone/
